name: Exemption from administrative supervision of boards and commissions
text: [§577E-6]  Exemption from administrative supervision of boards and commissions.  Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, the commission shall be exempt from section 26-35 with the exception of section [26-35(a)(2), (3), (7), and (8)]. [L 2003, c 156, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 148, §2; ree L 2006, c 232, pt of §1; am L 2007, c 190, §1]
